alert.note: Alert for Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Tusas Mountains Including Chama; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 05 at 2:03AM MST until March 05 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Tusas Mountains Including Chama, and Upper Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Tusas Mountains Including Chama; Upper Rio Grande Valley
